content.rendered:
Photo via Unsplash

This Week in Genesis, a new theme from Brian Gardner, a plugin for making your life easier with Genesis / CMB2, and a new podcast coming soon from the Genesis community.

Themes

It’s here! After several previews over the last few weeks, Monochrome Pro – the new theme from Brian Gardner – is now available over at StudioPress. Read the blog post about it.

Introducing Monochrome Pro: a Simple but Substantial Minimalist WordPress Theme — https://t.co/HzCWSVpB60 #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/CR8KmKGNAO

— Brian Gardner (@bgardner) May 10, 2017

Bharat Mandava releases the second theme for his ThemeSquare project, Vibrant Pro.

Introducing Vibrant Pro, a modern magazine #WordPress theme for #genesiswp Framework. https://t.co/0tCtLxRg05 pic.twitter.com/C8VxY4gEQ0

— Bharat Mandava (@_mandava) May 13, 2017

Showcase

Hat tip to StudioPress on this one, a great blog page design from the uber talented Michelle Martello for elenabrower.com/blog

What a gorgeous design for a blog page. Well done @minimadesigns! https://t.co/xPywM2lu6C #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/AzjMk7UAZG

— StudioPress (@studiopress) May 9, 2017

New site on ZigZagPress’s Minimalis theme for getrelatedworld.org

Check out https://t.co/6eTGB7HdJF – a beautiful site (and a cool mission) built on our #genesiswp Minimalis theme!

— zigzagpress.com (@zigzagpress) May 9, 2017

Website redesign based on SEO Themes’ Architect Pro from Elmer van der Veer for cvnschoonmaak.nl

CVN Cleaningservices

Podcasts

Tara Claeys, previous guest editor of this here weekly round-up, is launching a new podcast, Hallway Chats. Along with co-host Liam Dempsey, Tara hopes to turn the spotlight on those in the WordPress community that you may not have heard of yet.

Get ready for @HallwayChats, the #WordPress podcast brought to you by @design_tlc and @liamdempsey. Huzzah! https://t.co/iWLFm8baZ4

— Joseph H. Howard (@JosephHHoward) May 2, 2017

Best of the rest

Genesis CMB2 Meta Boxes is a plugin for simplifying adding CMB2 meta boxes to the Genesis Theme Settings and Genesis CPT Archive Settings pages.

https://t.co/IQLXDkYop8 #genesiswp

— Tim Jensen (@timothy_jensen_) May 13, 2017

Sridhar Katakam shows you how to setup URLs similar to how StudioPress handles third party theme demos…

How to set up URLs similar to StudioPress theme demos for third party Genesis theme demos:https://t.co/dNC6ezpusr#GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/AQXRoAtJgG

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) May 12, 2017

…plus how to replace the CSS class with an ID in the Title Area in Genesis.

How to replace class with an ID for Title Area in Genesis:https://t.co/gpZeFerdEV#GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/rzEkR1AoDx

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) May 11, 2017

StudioPress shares an interesting case study of using MemberPress with Genesis.

Great case study on MemberPress + #GenesisWP site — https://t.co/KPyy852ARn

— StudioPress (@studiopress) May 11, 2017

If you’re new to Genesis you might find the following guide useful from BobWP on changing your Genesis theme’s footer text.

Wanting to find an easy way to change that text in the footer in your #genesiswp child theme? https://t.co/hTOvBcBIw1 pic.twitter.com/xtWNk4eC1f

— BobWP (@bobWP) May 11, 2017

excerpt.rendered: New theme from Brian Gardner, a plugin for making your life easier with Genesis / CMB2, and a new podcast coming soon from the Genesis community
